problem.p: Two vehicles, one of mass M and the other of mass 2M, are moving in the same direction on a highway. Both drivers apply their brakes at the same time and both vehicles begin sliding. If the coefficient of kinetic friction \(\mu_{k}\) is the same for both vehicles, how do their accelerations a1 and a2 compare?

choice.name: foil1
choice.text: a1 is twice as great as a2

choice.name: foil2
choice.text: a1 is the same as a2

choice.name: foil3
choice.text: a1 is half as great as a2
